RespTxt: Christian (include volunteers of: Protestant, Church of Christ, Trinity Church, Baptist, Methodist, etc.)
QuestionTxt: Now, thinking about Barack Obama's religious beliefs...Do you happen to know what Barack Obama's religion is?  Is he Christian, Jewish, Muslim, Buddhist, Hindu, atheist, agnostic, or something else? (If Don't know, probe:) Is that because you've heard different things about his religion, or because you don't know enough about him?
